Osejs.Information.Title: Heat Flow
Osejs.Information.Author: Hector Vargas, UNED, Spain
Osejs.Information.Abstract: This simulation shows the control of temperature along of the duct. The figure of down shows the configuracion of the system.

Osejs.Description.Page.Name: HeatFlowSystem
Osejs.Description.Page.Content:
HeatFlow System

This simulation shows the control of temperature along of the duct.

The figure of down shows the configuracion of the system.

Variable.Comment: Whether to run in manual or automatic mode

Variable.Comment: Set point for the liquid level [cms]

Variable.Comment: Set point for the liquid level [cms]
